text: April 27, 2018 / 6:06 PM / Updated 19 hours ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 27 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 26 between Delhi Daredevils and Kolkata Knight Riders on Friday at Delhi, India Delhi Daredevils win by 55 runs Delhi Daredevils 1st innings Prithvi Shaw b Piyush Chawla 62 Colin Munro b Shivam Mavi 33 Shreyas Iyer Not Out 93 Rishabh Pant c Dinesh Karthik b Andre Russell 0 Glenn Maxwell Run Out Shivam Mavi 27 Extras 0b 1lb 1nb 0pen 2w 4 Total (20.0 overs) 219-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-59 Munro, 2-127 Shaw, 3-129 Pant, 4-202 Maxwell Did Not Bat : Shankar, Tewatia, Plunkett, Mishra, Khan, Boult Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Piyush Chawla 4 0 33 1 8.25 Kuldeep Yadav 2 0 22 0 11.00 Shivam Mavi 4 0 58 1 14.50 1w 1nb Sunil Narine 3 0 35 0 11.67 Mitchell Johnson 4 0 42 0 10.50 Andre Russell 3 0 28 1 9.33 1w Kolkata Knight Riders 1st innings Chris Lynn b Glenn Maxwell 5 Sunil Narine c Shreyas Iyer b Trent Boult 26 Robin Uthappa c Prithvi Shaw b Trent Boult 1 Nitish Rana c&b Avesh Khan 8 Dinesh Karthik c Trent Boult b Amit Mishra 18 Shubman Gill Run Out Shreyas Iyer 37 Andre Russell b Avesh Khan 44 Shivam Mavi b Amit Mishra 0 Piyush Chawla c Colin Munro b Glenn Maxwell 2 Mitchell Johnson Not Out 12 Kuldeep Yadav Not Out 7 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 3w 4 Total (20.0 overs) 164-9 Fall of Wickets : 1-19 Lynn, 2-20 Uthappa, 3-33 Narine, 4-46 Rana, 5-77 Karthik, 6-141 Gill, 7-141 Mavi, 8-144 Russell, 9-146 Chawla Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Trent Boult 4 0 44 2 11.00 2w Glenn Maxwell 2 0 22 2 11.00 Avesh Khan 4 0 29 2 7.25 1w Liam Plunkett 4 0 24 0 6.00 Amit Mishra 4 1 23 2 5.75 Vijay Shankar 1 0 10 0 10.00 Rahul Tewatia 1 0 11 0 11.00 Umpire Chettithody Shamsuddin Umpire Sundaram Ravi Video Ammanabrole Kishore Match Referee Richard Richardson
